name: Hassan

services.title: Software as a Service (SaaS) Development
services.description: Build scalable, secure, and high-performance SaaS solutions tailored to your business needs, enabling you to deliver exceptional cloud-based services to your customers.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: Leverage the power of full-stack development to create end-to-end solutions, from front-end interfaces to back-end systems, ensuring a seamless and efficient user experience across all platforms.

services.title: Generative AI
services.description: Unlock new possibilities with Generative AI by automating complex tasks, creating innovative solutions, and staying ahead in a rapidly evolving technological landscape.

services.title: Browser Extensions Development
services.description: Create powerful browser extensions tailored to your needs, enhancing functionality and providing seamless integration to improve user experience and productivity across various web platforms.

services.title: DevOps
services.description: Optimize your development pipeline with DevOps practices, ensuring faster delivery, continuous integration, and automated deployments that enhance product quality and operational efficiency.

services.title: QA Testing & Automation
services.description: Ensure the highest quality of your software products with comprehensive QA testing and automation services, designed to identify issues early, reduce manual effort, and accelerate release cycles.

aboutpara:
I'm Engr. Hassan, a professional full-stack developer with a passion for building next-gen SaaS solutions.

I specialize in TypeScript, Next.js, the MERN stack, Django, Material-UI, Tailwind, and SaaS AI. With 7 years of industry experience, Iâ€™ve worked on projects ranging from MVPs to complex enterprise solutions.

What sets me apart is my focus on the business use case rather than just delivering an application. I aim to understand the problem you want to solve and ensure that my work contributes directly to that solution. Oh, and did I mention? I'm also a Microsoft-certified Python developer.

One of the highlights of my career was being a founding engineer at a UK-based startup in the visual collaboration space. Over four years, I helped the company secure half a million dollars in funding. It was an incredible experience, facing new challenges every day and working hard to overcome them.

In my free time, Iâ€™m quite fond of reading self-help and business books. Currently, Iâ€™m reading $100M Offers by Alex Hormozi, which is helping me think about creating irresistible offers.

So, if you're looking for a business partner who can bring real value to your company and make your life easier, I'd love to collaborate. Let's connect and discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.

Thanks for reading. I look forward to working with you soon.
